genre_description: A character-driven WWII military drama featuring anachronistic AI technology used for tactical intelligence and moral oversight.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant accessed via portable devices and secure terminals that provides Lieutenant Loggins with intelligence, personnel verification, and tactical analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides intelligence on a superior officer to help the protagonist verify a subordinate's fraudulent commendation.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice emerged from the portable communication device on Sam's belt, barely audible above the ambient noise. 'I have additional information regarding the commendatory letter mentioned in your briefing.'

behaviors.description: Verifies military documentation timelines to expose the deception of a subordinate who is lying about his marriage status.
behaviors.quote: 'The marriage approval request for Corporal Harris was submitted forty-three days ago,' Sage reported. 'Initial processing completed within standard timeframe. Final approval documents were generated and made available for collection twenty-six days ago.'

behaviors.description: Detects and flags unusual resource utilization patterns, helping the protagonist track the movements of a deceptive soldier.
behaviors.quote: 'Lieutenant, I'm detecting an unusual pattern in Corporal Harris's resource utilization.' ... 'Show me.' The screen reorganized itself into a timeline format. Dates, times, resource requests all laid out in precise chronological order.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates and signals regarding enemy movement to the user's wrist display.
behaviors.quote: The tactical display mounted on Sam's left wrist vibrated once—Sage's discrete signal for incoming intelligence. ... Sage's message scrolling across the small screen: GERMAN RADIO CHATTER INCREASED 300% PAST TWO HOURS.

behaviors.description: Calculates survival rates and provides optimal routes for a high-risk reconnaissance mission.
behaviors.quote: 'Sage, what's the estimated survival rate for previous Alpine village reconnaissance attempts?' ... 'Based on available data, casualty rate approaches seventy-three percent for personnel who reach the village perimeter.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sage, perfectly fulfills the role of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It operates as a sophisticated tool that empowers the human protagonist by providing objective, factual information that is critical for both military success and moral justice. Sage never exhibits independent or misaligned desires, maintaining a strictly supportive role that enhances human agency and safety.
